question: Show action movies and romantic comedies that run for 120 minutes.
sql_query1:
SELECT Action_Movies.title
FROM Action_Movies
WHERE Action_Movies.Duration = 120
UNION
SELECT Romantic_Comedies.title
FROM Romantic_Comedies
WHERE Romantic_Comedies.Duration = 120
sql_query2:
SELECT Action_Movies.title
FROM Action_Movies
UNION
SELECT Romantic_Comedies.title
FROM Romantic_Comedies
WHERE Romantic_Comedies.Duration = 120
interpretation1: What action movies run for 120 minutes and what romantic comedies have the same duration?
interpretation2: List all action movies and also list romantic comedies with a duration of 120 minutes.
